text: @realDonaldTrump Well they didn't spy enough because here we are with over 150,000 dead, over 4 million positive COVD19 , economy in ruins, jobless, homeless , racist dema-god , environmental catastrophe , a nation divided it goes on &I on. So don't even go there loser
